layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  RenderView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  RenderBlock {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x600
    RenderBody {BODY} at (8,8) size 784x584
layer at (8,8) size 784x161
  RenderBlock {DIV} at (0,0) size 784x161 [border: (2px solid #800000)]
    RenderBlock {DIV} at (2,2) size 382x110
    RenderBlock {DIV} at (2,159) size 379x136 [bgcolor=#00FF00] [border: (2px solid #000000)]
      RenderBlock {DIV} at (12,2) size 355x132 [bgcolor=#008000] [border: (2px solid #0000FF)]

          RenderText {#text} at (2,2) size 192x128
            text run at (2,2) width 166: "In 2nd"
            text run at (2,66) width 192: "column"
        RenderText {#text} at (0,0) size 0x0
